dataObject.content: Despite saving millions upon millions of lives, vaccines have been meet with skepticism by a small but growing faction of conspiracy theorists. And Donald Trump, "human megaphone that is the president of the United States," has only made matters worse by supporting an "alternative vaccine schedule."

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Even if almost everybody would agree about the expression \"human megaphone\" refering to Donald Trump. It's unnecerray there to make the point. Everything else in the text is somewhat verifiable with numbers. Using this expression there is biased."}
